subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Ben Graham, an Australian in his second season, showed during Jets practice on Thursday just how much of an ally the wind could be. One of his punts drifted 81 yards before plummeting into the end zone.
snippet: Ben Graham, an Australian in his second season, showed during Jets practice on Thursday just how much of an ally the wind could be. One of his punts drifted 81 yards before plummeting into the end zone.
